select-admins-policy.name: select-admins-policy
select-admins-policy.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM admins
        WHERE admins.user_id = (select auth.uid())
      )

insert-admins-policy.name: insert-admins-policy
insert-admins-policy.withCheck:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM admins
        WHERE admins.user_id = (select auth.uid())
        AND admins.role = 'super_admin'
      )

update-admins-policy.name: update-admins-policy
update-admins-policy.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM admins
        WHERE admins.user_id = (select auth.uid())
        AND admins.role = 'super_admin'
      )

delete-admins-policy.name: delete-admins-policy
delete-admins-policy.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM admins
        WHERE admins.user_id = (select auth.uid())
        AND admins.role = 'super_admin'
      )

manage_own_character_keywords_policy.name: manage_own_character_keywords_policy
manage_own_character_keywords_policy.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM "characters"
        WHERE "characters"."character_id" = "character_keywords"."character_id"
        AND "characters"."creator_id" = (select auth.uid())
      )
manage_own_character_keywords_policy.withCheck:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM "characters"
        WHERE "characters"."character_id" = "character_keywords"."character_id"
        AND "characters"."creator_id" = (select auth.uid())
      )

manage_own_character_filters_policy.name: manage_own_character_filters_policy
manage_own_character_filters_policy.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM "characters"
        WHERE "characters"."character_id" = "character_safety_filters"."character_id"
        AND "characters"."creator_id" = (select auth.uid())
      )
manage_own_character_filters_policy.withCheck:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM "characters"
        WHERE "characters"."character_id" = "character_safety_filters"."character_id"
        AND "characters"."creator_id" = (select auth.uid())
      )

select-room-memories-policy.name: select-room-memories-policy
select-room-memories-policy.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM chat_rooms
        WHERE chat_rooms.room_id = "room_memories"."room_id"
        AND chat_rooms.user_id = (select auth.uid())
      )
